title: letteredhub
author: letteredhub
content: INEC Rivers State led by Dr. Johnson Alalibo Sinikiem, commenced the prcess of distributing Sensitive materials at the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) today Wednesday 22nd February 2023.This activity was witnessed by the Commissioner of Police, Rivers State, the DSS, Political Parties, Civil Society Organizations and the Media,Three (3) LGAs, Obio-Akpor, Port-Harcourt and Bonny successfully received their sensitive materials for onward movement to the LGAs today.  https://www.facebook.com/100064673052025/posts/pfbid03PapYnjdsehLWz3rEh2yDkZNp96zchg15suF5kV83zJJe61cGcPERFM9FwmXBrgGl/?app=fblmake una try give us update howfa INEC Dem don start to the distribute the election sensitive  materials around each local government for una own state and also how you the electorate dey prepared to go cast ur vote on Saturday 25/02/2023. As for Rivers state  inec distribute some of the materials first yesterday to three local government Bonny, Obio/akpor and PHALGA, and today wey be thursday dem go continue the distribution for the rest LGA's.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Weldone for the update. If the material have been distributed to their various LGA then it is election proper but I pray the election is free and fair as stated by the presidency, there should be tight security, the electoral officers should not compromise standards, they should do their work and not do otherwise. If I may ask how come they only distributed just to three local government yesterday atleast the numbers should have been reasonable so the various Local Government Areas that received early could start preparing in time ahead of the election come Saturday the 25th Feb 2023. I believe you are an electoral officer, you could be updating us on electoral results and outcome in your state so we could catch the vibe from our various locality to knowing what is happening in Rivers State.
